notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Writing—original draft preparation, L.A.P.; Idealization and organization of work and writing—original draft preparation, F.S.R.; Writing—review and editing, M.A.P., J.C.M.B., I.C.F.R.F.; Idealization and organization of work and writing—review and editing, L.B. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
